title: Somethings wrong with Ionia
body:
If they're from Ionia
birthplace origins/current residence etc. they got some problems/hated on/controversial etc.
commence listing...
{{champion:84}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:238}} and previously {{champion:24}} and riot hates {{champion:37}} 
(holy shit, i was surprised jax is affiliated with Ionia too)
like wtf, every champion who has a club of haters is from Ionia ;l

replies.body:
In actuality, Riven is Noxian.


But yeah, fun times in Ionia, it seems.
Riven was part of the Noxian invasion of Ionia and she deserted the army during the invasion... so I guess she's kind of Ionian?

Eh, I thought Riven must be from Ionia at some point cuz of her wind blade-eque technique...
that apparently was so similar to yasuo
Long story short, she was part of the Noxus invasion of Ionia, but went into self exile because she couldn't be part of a nation that used chemical weapons on her own battalion.
I don't run in to too many people who hate Ahri, Varus or Sona, all of whom were born in Ionia.

> [{quoted}](name=LankPants,realm=OCE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=JZUWWjrE,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-01-08T14:05:53.055+0000)
>
> I don't run in to too many people who hate Ahri, Varus or Sona, all of whom were born in Ionia.

Riot hates Sona
Sona lives in and was mostly raised in Demacia, if I recall correctly.
But she was found as a baby in Ionia and lived in an orphanage there until the Buvelle family adopted her.
Born mute and plays songs that REALLY HURT! She's also selectively telepathic ("Only you can hear me Summoner"). That girl's messed up in her own ways.
The telepathy thing is because Summoners form a mental link with the champion they are summoning, which is why they speak all the time and only you hear the VO.
ooh, almost forgot bout sona.... only included ionians players hated lol

> [{quoted}](name=LankPants,realm=OCE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=JZUWWjrE,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-01-08T14:05:53.055+0000)
>
> I don't run in to too many people who hate Ahri, Varus or Sona, all of whom were born in Ionia.

Except Rito, of course. Rito hates Sona.
You'll be fine if you remember the natural counters to Ionians:  {{champion:50}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:27}}

Noxians countering Ionians?  ~ 3~
idk... these asian champs are too OP for this shit
Ionia is full of cancerous champions. That's it.

Ionia is a place that values tradition and precision. Noxus seems more like a place that just likes getting things done, while Demacia values honor. It seems natural that Ionia would be the best home for assassins and duelists like Irelia.

Well its not exclusive to Ionia.
{{champion:105}}

yeah but a good chunk of them are from ionia
probably only fizz and katarina are exceptions

> [{quoted}](name=LeagueSrsBsns,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=JZUWWjrE,comment-id=000c0000,timestamp=2015-01-09T01:28:51.698+0000)
>
> yeah but a good chunk of them are from ionia
> probably only fizz and katarina are exceptions

{{champion:17}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}}

Although that's more a long running joke than anything else at this point.  Also release Xin, but that was ages ago now.  S1 opening?  Shit, time flies.
{{champion:16}} also lives in ionia
Do we really hate her like we hate everyone else tho? ;l

> [{quoted}](name=LeagueSrsBsns,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=JZUWWjrE,comment-id=000b0000,timestamp=2015-01-09T01:10:19.612+0000)
>
> Do we really hate her like we hate everyone else tho? ;l

I do, but thats just because shes a BITCH.

You forgot {{champion:62}} . He's from Ionia and everyone hates him lol.

Hoping the next event is based in Ionia.
Wukong is from the Plague Jungles actually. He was trained by Master Yi in Ionia though.

That's interesting, but it leaves out Fizz and Teemo, and saying "anyone who has anything to do with Ionia" is a really broad scope. Ionia is a messed up place, because until the retcon comes out, half of the island got destroyed and totally annihilated by the Noxian invasion. Having half your island taken over and losing half your population with it has got to put a damper on life for most Ionians.
and so many Ionians decided to make life hell for everyone else in the fields of justice?
What are these "fields of justice" you speak of? :P

summoner's rift
twisted tree lines
howling wutever

that stuff
I guess most notably in summoners rift i guess

Sorry, I was being snarky. What I was getting at is that with the lore retcon (a consequence of which is the Noxian invasion succeeding, until we're told otherwise), the fields of justice aren't in-canon any more. They are essentially Smash Bros maps, not real places.
I never actually read much of the lores before, so... Yea, I'll read them sometime.

Isn't Kennen related to Ionia?

Was he OP at some point? 0_0

> [{quoted}](name=Terra Booma,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=JZUWWjrE,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-01-08T20:41:43.904+0000)
>
> Isn't Kennen related to Ionia?
> 
> Was he OP at some point? 0_0

minions.
And Shen, those two are the kings of cancer champs, amirite?
Of course, then you have poor Varus...

Ionia's schtick seems to be overloaded kits with high mobility and complicated mechanics.  Even the older ones do more than their non-ionian counterparts be default.  Ex.  Akali throws her Q then dives in for instant burst.  If you live she can gap close to you two more times and her smokebomb gives her defenses and a few ways to creatively juke... compare to Talon who can gapclose to you ONCE, needs to pop a spell or two after doing it to burst you (since his E does no damage) and needs to pop his ult to get out afterwards.  Nevermind that he's mana restricted and she's not, or that his ult telegraphs the way he fled.  

Ionia tends towards champs that are manaless, mobile, and bursty.  Is anyone shocked that they're regularly considered OP?  They're the nation of #LCSBIGPLAYS.
The asian players dominate LoL and so do the asian champions.

{{champion:43}} this.

Every Ionian but Karma get insane mobility and "outplay" potential. People get mad when they get killed and doesn't want to accept the fact that their opponent migt be better than they are, nor they are "honorable opponent". I myself always give out that honor for anyone who was against me top or mid that won the lane without jungler help.

Seriously though, every Noxian is also a powerful pick against Ionian. 

Darius will wreck any top laner that is an all in melee and let him reach in range

Vladimir will destroy any sustain tank that have no all in capability such as Malphite 

Leblanc is Leblanc, nothing much to say here

Swain is great in extended fight

Draven is Draaaaaaaaaven
